Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -945,10 +945,12 @@
COMING FALL 2026 -

Introducing Sociail Assistant

-

Your AI companion that moves Sociail at the pace of life.
From desk to car, office to playground, and everywhere in between.

+

Sociail Assistant

+

Your hands-free gateway to Shared Intelligence

+

Turn any moment—commute, kitchen, or workshop—into an AI-powered workflow with one tap or a simple "Hey Sociail."

+

Voice-first, screen-optional collaboration for builders, drivers, and doers.

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -1058,8 +1058,88 @@

Designed for Life in Motion

+ + +
+
+
🔈
+

50 ft Far-Field Audio

+

Capture crystal-clear commands—even over power-tools or road noise.

+
+
+
🌈
+

Live Status Ring

+

See "Ready, Listening, Thinking, Speaking" at a glance.

+
+
+
🔋
+

All-Day Battery

+

12 hrs active / 48 hrs standby keeps pace with your shift.

+
+
+ + +
+

From desk mode to driving mode—no context lost

+

Pick up a chat thread at your keyboard, hand-off to Sociail Assistant while you drive home, and finish on tablet after dinner. The AI remembers everything so you don't have to.

+
+ + +
+

Built for Every Environment

+
+
+ 🛠 +
+ Workshop
+ "Hey Sociail, torque spec for M8 bolts." +
+
+
+ 🚗 +
+ Commute
+ "Summarize today's stand-up in 30 seconds." +
+
+
+ 👩‍🍳 +
+ Kitchen
+ "Set a 3-minute sear timer—hands messy!" +
+
+
+ 🦺 +
+ Fieldwork
+ "Log GPS + photo, label 'Site B hazard'." +
+
+
+
+ + +
+

Privacy you can see and hear

+
+
+
●
+

Physical mic-cut switch → LED turns red

+
+
+
📱
+

Wake-word processed on your iPhone (never in the cloud)

+
+
+
🔒
+

End-to-end encrypted BLE audio

+
+
+
+

COMING FALL 2026

Sociail Assistant

-

Your hands-free gateway to Shared Intelligence

-

Turn any moment—commute, kitchen, or workshop—into an AI-powered workflow with one tap or a simple "Hey Sociail."

-

Voice-first, screen-optional collaboration for builders, drivers, and doers.

+

Your Sociail intelligence, everywhere you go

The first AI companion that switches contexts as fast as you do. Work conversations stay at work. Personal stays personal.

Pick up a chat thread at your keyboard, hand-off to Sociail Assistant while you drive home, and finish on tablet after dinner. The AI remembers everything so you don't have to.

+

From lean-forward to lean-back—seamless context switching

+

Start a feature idea while driving, continue when you get to your desk, and share with your team. Sociail Assistant extends your digital intelligence into physical spaces while keeping work and personal conversations completely separate.

Always Ready

-

Wake word activation with less than 100ms response time. No app to open, no screen to touch.

-
-
- - - -

Privacy First

-

Hardware mute switch, on-device wake word, and end-to-end encryption keep your conversations private.

-
-
- - - -

All-Day Battery

-

12+ hours of active use. USB-C fast charging and wireless charging keep you powered.

-
-
- - - -

Sustainable Design

-

65% recycled materials, replaceable battery, and mail-back recycling program.

-
-
- - - -

iPhone Powered

-

Leverages your iPhone's processing power for instant, intelligent responses.

-
-
- - - -

Multi-User Ready

-

Voice profiles for the whole family or team, with personalized responses.

-

- - Work Space
- Team chats, projects -
-

- Shopping, health, hobbies -
-
- - Family Space
- Shared calendars, lists -
-
-
-

Keep Life Organized with Spaces

-

Separate work from personal life with a simple voice command. Your shopping lists stay out of team chat.

-
-
"Hey Sociail, use Personal Space"
-
"Switch to Work Space"
-
"Create new space called Side Project"

commits.content:
SOCIAIL
  • Features
  • Get Notified
COMING FALL 2026

Meet Sociail Assistant

Hands-free Shared Intelligence—desk to car, workshop to kitchen.

"Schedule team stand-up""Add milk to list" "Torque spec Civic""Brainstorm podcast names"
"Play relaxing music""Use Personal Space" "Weather tomorrow?""Draft marketing email"
© 2025 Sociail · Privacy | Terms
